title: If there is no data for series, it should display a friendly error message
OB: When I preview the application, there is no friendly error message displayed when there is no data for a series.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the application and go to the series page. 
2. Remove the data for a series. 
3. Preview the application and observe that a friendly error message should be displayed instead of a blank space or the series not showing up.
